neat.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: His clothes were always neat and clean.
Everything in the house was neat and tidy.
She arranged the books in a nice neat pile.
neat.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: someone who is neat likes to keep things tidy
neat.translation[0].definitions[2].examp: I liked working for him – he was a neat guy.
neat.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: something that is neat is small and attractive
neat.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: a neat way of doing or saying something is simple but clever and effective
neat.translation[0].definitions[4].examp: In the end we found a very neat solution to the problem.
a neat summary of the main issues
neat.translation[0].definitions[5].defin: a neat alcoholic drink has no ice or water or any other liquid added
